oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Low temperature giant magnetocaloric effect in multiferroic GdMnO3 single crystals
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: WAGH, AA
SURESH, KG
KUMAR, PSA
ELIZABETH, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: GD5SI2GE2
magnetocaloric effect
single crystals
multiferroics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Magnetocaloric (MC) properties of GdMnO3 single crystals are investigated using magnetic and magneto-thermal measurements. GdMnO3 exhibits a giant MC effect (isothermal change in magnetic entropy (-Delta S-M) similar to 31 J (kg K)(-1) at 7 K and adiabatic change in temperature similar to 10 K at 19 K for magnetic field variation 0-80 kOe). Complex interactions between 3d and 4f magnetic sublattices influence MC properties. The rare-earth antiferromagnetic ordering induces an inverse MC effect (positive Delta S-M) along 'a' and 'c' axes whereas it's not seen along the 'b' axis, revealing complex anisotropic magnetic ordering. The antiferromagnetic ordering possibly changes to ferromagnetic ordering at higher fields.
